    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_thm" inlist="thm theorem:thm" labels="LABEL:prop1" xml:id="Thmthm3">
      <tags>
        <tag>Theorem 3</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">3</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Theorem 3</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Theorem 3</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="Thmthm3.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi:(M^{m},g)\to(N^{n},h)" text="phi colon open-interval@(M ^ m, g) to open-interval@(N ^ n, h)" xml:id="Thmthm3.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmthm3.p1.m1.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmthm3.p1.m1.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="Thmthm3.p1.m1.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmthm3.p1.m1.1">g</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmthm3.p1.m1.4"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmthm3.p1.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="Thmthm3.p1.m1.4">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmthm3.p1.m1.2">h</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> (<Math mode="inline" tex="m\geqslant n\geqslant 2" text="m &gt;= n &gt;= 2" xml:id="Thmthm3.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geqslant" role="RELOP">⩾</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than-or-equals" name="geqslant" role="RELOP">⩾</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>) be a horizontally
weakly conformal map of dilation <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda" text="lambda" xml:id="Thmthm3.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> between Riemannian manifolds, then
<Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="Thmthm3.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is biharmonic if and only if, at every regular point</text></p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx15">
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex39">
            <MathFork>

                      <XMDual>

        <p><text font="italic">where <Math mode="inline" tex="X=(2-n)\operatorname{grad}^{\mathcal{H}}\ln\lambda-(m-n)\mu" text="X = (2 - n) * (grad ^ H)@(natural-logarithm@(lambda)) - (m - n) * mu" xml:id="Thmthm3.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmthm3.p1.m5.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="Thmthm3.p1.m5.1">
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">grad</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" meaning="natural-logarithm" role="OPFUNCTION">ln</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmthm3.p1.m5.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="Thmthm3.p1.m5.2">
                            <XMTok font="upright" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="\operatorname{grad}^{\mathcal{H}}" text="grad ^ H" xml:id="Thmthm3.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="upright" role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">grad</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="caligraphic upright" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> being the horizontal
gradient.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.p3">
        <p>At a regular point, the tension field of a horizontally weakly conformal map <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi:(M^{m},g)\to(N^{n},h)" text="phi colon open-interval@(M ^ m, g) to open-interval@(N ^ n, h)" xml:id="S4.p3.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m1.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m1.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p3.m1.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p3.m1.1">g</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m1.4"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m1.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p3.m1.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p3.m1.2">h</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, of dilation <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda" text="lambda" xml:id="S4.p3.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, is <Math mode="inline" tex="\tau(\phi)=d\phi(X)" text="tau * phi = d * phi * X" xml:id="S4.p3.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m3.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p3.m3.1">ϕ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m3.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p3.m3.2">X</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="X=(2-n)\operatorname{grad}^{\mathcal{H}}\ln\lambda-(m-n)\mu" text="X = (2 - n) * (grad ^ H)@(natural-logarithm@(lambda)) - (m - n) * mu" xml:id="S4.p3.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p3.m4.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.p3.m4.1">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">grad</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="natural-logarithm" role="OPFUNCTION">ln</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>

                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.p3.m4.2">
                          <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>

                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Recall that the mean curvature of the horizontal
distribution is <Math mode="inline" tex="\nu=\operatorname{grad}^{\mathcal{V}}\ln\lambda" text="nu = (grad ^ V)@(natural-logarithm@(lambda))" xml:id="S4.p3.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">grad</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="natural-logarithm" role="OPFUNCTION">ln</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then, for an adapted orthonormal frame
<Math mode="inline" tex="\{e_{i},e_{s}\}_{i=1,\dots,n,s=1,\dots,m-n}" text="(set@(e _ i, e _ s)) _ (formulae@(i = list@(1, dots, n), s = list@(1, dots, m - n)))" xml:id="S4.p3.m6">

            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle+X(\ln\lambda)\nabla^{\phi}_{e_{i}}d\phi(e_{i})-e_{i}\langle X,e_%&#10;{i}\rangle d\phi(\operatorname{grad}\ln\lambda)-\langle X,e_{i}\rangle e_{i}(%&#10;\ln\lambda)d\phi(\operatorname{grad}\ln\lambda)" text="(+ X * natural-logarithm@(lambda) * ((nabla ^ phi) _ e _ i)@(d * phi) * e _ i) - e _ i * list@(X, e _ i) * d * phi * grad@(natural-logarithm@(lambda)) - list@(X, e _ i) * e _ i * natural-logarithm@(lambda) * d * phi * grad@(natural-logarithm@(lambda))" xml:id="S4.Ex47.m2">

        <p>since <Math mode="inline" tex="({\mathcal{L}}_{V}g)(X,Y)=-g(\nabla_{X}Y+\nabla_{Y}X,V)=-d(\ln\lambda^{2})(V)g%&#10;(X,Y)" text="L _ V * g * open-interval@(X, Y) = - g * open-interval@((nabla _ X)@(Y) + (nabla _ Y)@(X), V) = - d * natural-logarithm@(lambda ^ 2) * V * g * open-interval@(X, Y)" xml:id="S4.p3.m11">

        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx24">
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex69">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle-\langle(\nabla_{e_{i}}X)^{\mathcal{V}},\operatorname{grad}^{%&#10;\mathcal{V}}\ln\lambda\rangle d\phi(e_{i})=-d\phi(\nabla_{X}\operatorname{grad%&#10;}^{\mathcal{V}}\ln\lambda)-2|\operatorname{grad}^{\mathcal{V}}\ln\lambda|^{2}d%&#10;\phi(X)." text="- list@(((nabla _ e _ i)@(X)) ^ V, (grad ^ V)@(natural-logarithm@(lambda))) * d * phi * e _ i = - d * phi * ((nabla _ X)@(grad ^ V))@(natural-logarithm@(lambda)) - 2 * (absolute-value@((grad ^ V)@(natural-logarithm@(lambda)))) ^ 2 * d * phi * X" xml:id="S4.Ex69.m2">

                  <XMDual>

                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>

                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMath>
              </Math>

      <theorem class="ltx_theorem_lem" inlist="thm theorem:lem" xml:id="Thmlem1">
        <tags>
          <tag>Lemma 1</tag>
          <tag role="refnum">1</tag>
          <tag role="typerefnum">Lemma 1</tag>
        </tags>
        <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Lemma 1</text></tag>.</title>
        <para xml:id="Thmlem1.p1">
          <p><text font="italic">Let <Math mode="inline" tex="A" text="A" xml:id="Thmlem1.p1.m1">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="B" text="B" xml:id="Thmlem1.p1.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                </XMath>
              </Math> be the second fundamental forms of the horizontal and vertical
distributions. Then</text></p>
          <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx27">
            <equation xml:id="S4.Ex77">
              <MathFork>
                <Math tex="\displaystyle d\phi(\operatorname{trace}_{h}\nabla(\nabla X)^{\mathcal{V}})=d%&#10;\phi(\operatorname{trace}(\nabla A)X);" xml:id="S4.Ex77.m2">
                  <XMath>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">trace</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR" xml:id="S4.Ex77.m2.1">∇</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="caligraphic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">V</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">trace</XMTok>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">X</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">;</XMTok>
                  </XMath>
                </Math>
                <MathBranch>
                  <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle d\phi(\operatorname{trace}_{h}\nabla(\nabla X)^{\mathcal{V}})=d%&#10;\phi(\operatorname{trace}(\nabla A)X);" xml:id="S4.Ex77.m1">
                      <XMath>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>

                  <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle+\operatorname{trace}d\phi((\nabla A)^{*}_{X}+3A^{*}_{\nabla X}+(%&#10;\nabla_{X}B^{*})^{*}-B_{\nabla X}-2A^{*}_{\nabla_{X}}+2B_{\nabla_{X}})+nd\phi(%&#10;A^{*}_{X}\nu)." text="+ trace@(d * phi) * (((((nabla@(A)) ^ *) _ X + 3 * (A ^ *) _ (nabla@(X)) + ((nabla _ X)@(B ^ *)) ^ *) - B _ (nabla@(X)) - 2 * (A ^ *) _ nabla _ X) + 2 * B _ nabla _ X) + n * d * phi * (A ^ *) _ X * nu" xml:id="S4.Ex79.m1">

      <proof>

            <equation xml:id="S4.Ex81">
              <MathFork>

              <MathFork>
                <Math tex="\displaystyle\langle\nabla_{[e_{s},X]}e_{j},e_{s}\rangle=\langle e_{j},A^{*}_{%&#10;\nabla_{e_{s}}X}e_{s}-A^{*}_{\nabla_{X}e_{s}}e_{s}-B_{\nabla_{e_{s}}X}e_{s}+B_%&#10;{\nabla_{X}e_{s}}e_{s}\rangle." text="list@((nabla _ (closed-interval@(e _ s, X)))@(e _ j), e _ s) = list@(e _ j, ((A ^ *) _ ((nabla _ e _ s)@(X)) * e _ s - (A ^ *) _ ((nabla _ X)@(e _ s)) * e _ s - B _ ((nabla _ e _ s)@(X)) * e _ s) + B _ ((nabla _ X)@(e _ s)) * e _ s)" xml:id="S4.Ex84.m3">

                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMath>
                    </Math></td>

      </proof>
      <para xml:id="S4.p5">
        <p>Note that for a horizontally weakly conformal map, the curvature term of the bitension field becomes</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex88">
          <Math mode="display" tex="-\lambda^{2}\operatorname{Ricci}^{N}(d\phi(X))." text="- lambda ^ 2 * (Ricci ^ N)@(d * phi * X)" xml:id="S4.Ex88.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex88.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex88.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex88.m1.2.1"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex88.m1.2.2"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex88.m1.2.1">
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">Ricci</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex88.m1.2.2">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex88.m1.1"/>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex88.m1.1">X</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>This completes the proof.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S4.p6">
      <p>Three special cases are interesting enough to be stated separately.
<!--  %**** String Line 725 **** --></p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_cor" inlist="thm theorem:cor" labels="LABEL:cor1" xml:id="Thmcor2">
      <tags>
        <tag>Corollary 2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Corollary 2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Corollary 2</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="Thmcor2.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">i) A conformal map <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi:(M^{m},g)\to(N^{n},h)" text="phi colon open-interval@(M ^ m, g) to open-interval@(N ^ n, h)" xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmcor2.p1.m1.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmcor2.p1.m1.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m1.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m1.1">g</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmcor2.p1.m1.4"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmcor2.p1.m1.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m1.4">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m1.2">h</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of conformal factor <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda" text="lambda" xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,
between manifolds of equal dimensions (<Math mode="inline" tex="m=n&gt;2" text="m = n &gt; 2" xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>), is biharmonic if and only if</text></p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx31">
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex89">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle-d\phi(\Delta(\operatorname{grad}\ln\lambda))-\Delta(\ln\lambda)d%&#10;\phi(\operatorname{grad}\ln\lambda)+2d\phi(\operatorname{grad}|\operatorname{%&#10;grad}\ln\lambda|^{2})" text="(- d * phi * Delta * grad@(natural-logarithm@(lambda)) - Delta * natural-logarithm@(lambda) * d * phi * grad@(natural-logarithm@(lambda))) + 2 * d * phi * grad@((absolute-value@(grad@(natural-logarithm@(lambda)))) ^ 2)" xml:id="S4.Ex89.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex89.m2.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex89.m2.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok name="Delta" role="UNKNOWN">Δ</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex89.m2.1.1"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex89.m2.1.1">

        <p><text font="italic">ii) A horizontally conformal map <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi:(M^{m},g)\to(N^{2},h)" text="phi colon open-interval@(M ^ m, g) to open-interval@(N ^ 2, h)" xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmcor2.p1.m4.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmcor2.p1.m4.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m4.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m4.1">g</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmcor2.p1.m4.4"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmcor2.p1.m4.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m4.4">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m4.2">h</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> of dilation <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda" text="lambda" xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, into
a surface (<Math mode="inline" tex="m&gt;n=2" text="m &gt; n = 2" xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>

                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>), is biharmonic if and only if</text></p>

          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex92">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle+(m-2)|\mu|^{2}d\phi(\operatorname{grad}\ln\lambda)-d\phi(\nabla_%&#10;{\mu}\operatorname{grad}\ln\lambda)+\lambda^{2}\operatorname{Ricci}^{N}(d\phi(%&#10;\mu))" text="((+ (m - 2) * (absolute-value@(mu)) ^ 2 * d * phi * grad@(natural-logarithm@(lambda))) - d * phi * ((nabla _ mu)@(grad))@(natural-logarithm@(lambda))) + lambda ^ 2 * (Ricci ^ N)@(d * phi * mu)" xml:id="S4.Ex92.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>

          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex94">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle+\operatorname{trace}d\phi((\nabla A)^{*}_{\mu}-(\nabla A)\mu+3A^%&#10;{*}_{\nabla\mu}+(\nabla_{\mu}B^{*})^{*}+2B_{\nabla_{\mu}}-B_{\nabla\mu}-2A^{*}%&#10;_{\nabla_{\mu}})" text="+ trace@(d * phi) * (((((nabla@(A)) ^ *) _ mu - nabla@(A) * mu) + 3 * (A ^ *) _ (nabla@(mu)) + ((nabla _ mu)@(B ^ *)) ^ * + 2 * B _ nabla _ mu) - B _ (nabla@(mu)) - 2 * (A ^ *) _ nabla _ mu)" xml:id="S4.Ex94.m2">
                <XMath>

                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">trace</XMTok>

        <p><text font="italic">iii) A homothetic submersion <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi:(M^{m},g)\to(N^{n},h)" text="phi colon open-interval@(M ^ m, g) to open-interval@(N ^ n, h)" xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmcor2.p1.m7.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmcor2.p1.m7.1"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m7.3">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m7.1">g</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmcor2.p1.m7.4"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmcor2.p1.m7.2"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m7.4">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m7.2">h</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> (<Math mode="inline" tex="m&gt;n" text="m &gt; n" xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="greater-than" role="RELOP">&gt;</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>), i.e. <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda" text="lambda" xml:id="Thmcor2.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is
constant, is biharmonic if and only if</text></p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx33">
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex96">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle d\phi(\Delta\mu)-\lambda^{2}\operatorname{Ricci}^{N}(d\phi(\mu))%&#10;+(m-n)d\phi(\nabla_{\mu}\mu)" text="(d * phi * Delta * mu - lambda ^ 2 * (Ricci ^ N)@(d * phi * mu)) + (m - n) * d * phi * (nabla _ mu)@(mu)" xml:id="S4.Ex96.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex96.m2.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex96.m2.2">
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok name="Delta" role="UNKNOWN">Δ</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex96.m2.3"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex96.m2.4"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex96.m2.3">
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>

                                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">A</XMTok>
                                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="times" role="MULOP">*</XMTok>
                                              </XMApp>
                                              <XMApp>
                                                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" name="mu" role="UNKNOWN">μ</XMTok>
                                              </XMApp>
                                            </XMApp>
                                          </XMApp>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
              </MathBranch>
            </MathFork>
          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_rk" inlist="thm theorem:rk" xml:id="Thmrk6">
      <tags>
        <tag>Remark 6</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">6</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Remark 6</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Remark 6</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="Thmrk6.p1">
        <p>i) The case <Math mode="inline" tex="m=n=2" text="m = n = 2" xml:id="Thmrk6.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is trivial since any conformal map between surfaces is harmonic, hence biharmonic.<break/>ii) When <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi:(M^{m},g)\to(N^{m},h)" text="phi colon open-interval@(M ^ m, g) to open-interval@(N ^ m, h)" xml:id="Thmrk6.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok name="colon" role="METARELOP">:</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok name="to" role="ARROW">→</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="Thmrk6.p1.m2.3"/>
                      <XMRef idref="Thmrk6.p1.m2.1"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="Thmrk6.p1.m2.3">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">M</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmrk6.p1.m2.1">g</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="Thmrk6.p1.m2.4"/>
                      <XMRef idref="Thmrk6.p1.m2.2"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="Thmrk6.p1.m2.4">
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">m</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmrk6.p1.m2.2">h</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is the identity and <Math mode="inline" tex="h=e^{2\rho}g" text="h = e ^ (2 * rho) * g" xml:id="Thmrk6.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>,
Equation (<ref labelref="LABEL:eqf"/>) becomes Equation (3.1) of <cite class="ltx_citemacro_cite">[<bibref bibrefs="Bal" separator="," yyseparator=","/>]</cite>:</p>

          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <para xml:id="S4.p7">
      <p>The first case of Corollary <ref labelref="LABEL:cor1"/> is the most prolific and the following
examples indicate that not only horizontally weakly conformal biharmonic maps are
easier to come by than biharmonic morphisms, but also that, even for this situation,
dimension four emerges as remarkable.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_prop" inlist="thm theorem:prop" xml:id="Thmprop1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Proposition 1</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">1</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Proposition 1</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Proposition 1</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="Thmprop1.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">The inverse stereographic projection <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{\mathrm{N}}^{-1}" text="(sigma _ N) ^ (- 1)" xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> from <Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbb{R}}}^{n},ds^{2})" text="open-interval@(R ^ n, d * s ^ 2)" xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="Thmprop1.p1.m2.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="Thmprop1.p1.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m2.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m2.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>

                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
into <Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbb{S}}}^{n}\setminus\{\mathrm{N}\},ds^{2})" text="open-interval@(S ^ n set-minus set@(N), d * s ^ 2)" xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m3">

                      </XMApp>

                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m3.3">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>

                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="\mathrm{N}" text="N" xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMTok font="upright" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is the north pole and
<Math mode="inline" tex="ds^{2}" text="d * s ^ 2" xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> the Euclidean metric, is a biharmonic map if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="n=4" text="n = 4" xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.<break/>Similarly, the identity map from <Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbb{B}}}^{n},ds^{2})" text="open-interval@(B ^ n, d * s ^ 2)" xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="Thmprop1.p1.m7.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="Thmprop1.p1.m7.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m7.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m7.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>
into <Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbb{B}}}^{n},\tfrac{4}{(1-|x|^{2})^{2}}ds^{2})" text="open-interval@(B ^ n, (4 / (1 - (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 2) * d * s ^ 2)" xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m8">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>

                    <XMApp xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m8.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m8.4">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="Thmprop1.p1.m8.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m8.2">
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="Thmprop1.p1.m8.1"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m8.1">x</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbb{B}}}^{n}" text="B ^ n" xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m9">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is the open unit ball of <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbb{R}}}^{n}" text="R ^ n" xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m10">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>,
<!--  %**** String Line 775 **** -->is a biharmonic map if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="n=4" text="n = 4" xml:id="Thmprop1.p1.m11">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.<break/>Furthermore, in either case, the biharmonic map is not a biharmonic morphism.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.p8">
        <p>For the first case, the map is given by <Math mode="inline" tex="\sigma_{\mathrm{N}}^{-1}(x)=\tfrac{1}{1+|x|^{2}}(1-|x|^{2},2x)" text="(sigma _ N) ^ (- 1) * x = (1 / (1 + (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2)) * open-interval@(1 - (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2, 2 * x)" xml:id="S4.p8.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="sigma" role="UNKNOWN">σ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">N</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m1.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m1.2">x</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m1.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m1.4"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m1.5"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p8.m1.4">
                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m1.3"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m1.3">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p8.m1.5">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and is isometric to the identity map from the Euclidean space <Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbb{R}}}^{n},ds^{2})" text="open-interval@(R ^ n, d * s ^ 2)" xml:id="S4.p8.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m2.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m2.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p8.m2.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p8.m2.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> into
(<Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbb{R}}}^{n},\tfrac{4}{(1+|x|^{2})^{2}}ds^{2})" xml:id="S4.p8.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m3.2"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.p8.m3.2">
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m3.1"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p8.m3.1">x</XMTok>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. We can treat both examples at once, by considering the identity map
<Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S4.p8.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> on <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbb{R}}}^{n}" text="R ^ n" xml:id="S4.p8.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> or <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbb{B}}}^{n}" text="B ^ n" xml:id="S4.p8.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, from the Euclidean metric <Math mode="inline" tex="ds^{2}" text="d * s ^ 2" xml:id="S4.p8.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> into the conformal metric <Math mode="inline" tex="\tfrac{4}{(1+\epsilon|x|^{2})^{2}}ds^{2}" text="(4 / (1 + epsilon * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 2) * d * s ^ 2" xml:id="S4.p8.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m8.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.p8.m8.2">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.p8.m8.1"/>
                                </XMApp>

              <Math tex="\displaystyle\operatorname{grad}|\operatorname{grad}\ln\lambda|^{2}=\tfrac{8(1%&#10;-\epsilon|x|^{2})}{(1+\epsilon|x|^{2})^{3}}x;\quad\Delta\ln\lambda=-\tfrac{2%&#10;\epsilon}{(1+\epsilon|x|^{2})^{2}}(n+(n-2)\epsilon|x|^{2});" text="formulae@(grad@((absolute-value@(grad@(natural-logarithm@(lambda)))) ^ 2) = ((8 * (1 - epsilon * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2)) / (1 + epsilon * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 3) * x, Delta * natural-logarithm@(lambda) = - ((2 * epsilon) / (1 + epsilon * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 2) * (n + (n - 2) * epsilon * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2))" xml:id="S4.Ex101.m3">

              <Math tex="\displaystyle(\operatorname{trace}\nabla^{2})(\operatorname{grad}\ln\lambda)=%&#10;\tfrac{4}{(1+\epsilon|x|^{2})^{3}}(n+2+(n-2)\epsilon|x|^{2})x," text="trace * nabla ^ 2 * grad@(natural-logarithm@(lambda)) = (4 / (1 + epsilon * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 3) * (n + 2 + (n - 2) * epsilon * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) * x" xml:id="S4.Ex102.m3">

        <p>and Equation (<ref labelref="LABEL:eqf"/>) becomes</p>

          <Math mode="display" tex="-8(n-4)\tfrac{(1-\epsilon|x|^{2})}{(1+\epsilon|x|^{2})^{3}}x=0," text="- 8 * (n - 4) * ((1 - epsilon * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) / (1 + epsilon * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 3) * x = 0" xml:id="S4.Ex103.m1">

        <p>so both maps, into the sphere or the Poincaré model, are biharmonic if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="n=4" text="n = 4" xml:id="S4.p8.m13">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>.<break/>To know whether <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S4.p8.m14">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is also a biharmonic morphism we only
need to check Equation (<ref labelref="LABEL:eqd"/>), whose constituents are</p>

              <MathBranch>
                <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\tau(\phi)" text="tau * phi" xml:id="S4.Ex104.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

              <MathBranch>
                <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\nabla|\tau(\phi)|^{2}" text="nabla@((absolute-value@(tau * phi)) ^ 2)" xml:id="S4.Ex106.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex106.m1.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
