                                          </XMApp>
                                          <XMWrap>
                                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex108.m1.4">x</XMTok>
                                            <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                          </XMWrap>
                                        </XMDual>
                                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
              </MathBranch>
            </MathFork>
          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
        <p>so <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S4.p8.m15">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> cannot be a biharmonic morphism.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_prop" inlist="thm theorem:prop" xml:id="Thmprop2">
      <tags>
        <tag>Proposition 2</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">2</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Proposition 2</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Proposition 2</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="Thmprop2.p1">
        <p><text font="italic">The identity map from <Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbb{B}}}^{n},ds^{2})" text="open-interval@(B ^ n, d * s ^ 2)" xml:id="Thmprop2.p1.m1">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="Thmprop2.p1.m1.1"/>
                    <XMRef idref="Thmprop2.p1.m1.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="Thmprop2.p1.m1.1">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="Thmprop2.p1.m1.2">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math> to <Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbb{B}}}^{n},h)" text="open-interval@(B ^ n, h)" xml:id="Thmprop2.p1.m2">
              <XMath>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="Thmprop2.p1.m2.2"/>
                    <XMRef idref="Thmprop2.p1.m2.1"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="Thmprop2.p1.m2.2">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmprop2.p1.m2.1">h</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, where <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbb{B}}}^{n}" text="B ^ n" xml:id="Thmprop2.p1.m3">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> is the unit
ball in <Math mode="inline" tex="{{\mathbb{R}}}^{n}" text="R ^ n" xml:id="Thmprop2.p1.m4">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="blackboard upright" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>, <Math mode="inline" tex="ds^{2}" text="d * s ^ 2" xml:id="Thmprop2.p1.m5">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> its Euclidean metric and <Math mode="inline" tex="h_{x}=\tfrac{4}{(1-|x|^{2})^{2}}ds^{2}" text="h _ x = (4 / (1 - (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 2) * d * s ^ 2" xml:id="Thmprop2.p1.m6">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">h</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="Thmprop2.p1.m6.2"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMApp xml:id="Thmprop2.p1.m6.2">
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                              <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="Thmprop2.p1.m6.1"/>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmprop2.p1.m6.1">x</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                                <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="upright" fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math> gives the hyperbolic space, is a biharmonic map if and only if <Math mode="inline" tex="n=4" text="n = 4" xml:id="Thmprop2.p1.m7">
              <XMath>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="upright" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMath>
            </Math>.
Furthermore, in either case, the biharmonic map is not a biharmonic morphism.</text></p>
      </para>
    </theorem>
    <proof>
      <title class="ltx_runin" font="italic">Proof.</title>
      <para xml:id="S4.p9">
        <p>Call <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S4.p9.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> the identity from <Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbb{B}}}^{n},ds^{2})" text="open-interval@(B ^ n, d * s ^ 2)" xml:id="S4.p9.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p9.m2.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p9.m2.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p9.m2.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p9.m2.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math> to <Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbb{B}}}^{n},h)" text="open-interval@(B ^ n, h)" xml:id="S4.p9.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p9.m3.2"/>
                  <XMRef idref="S4.p9.m3.1"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.p9.m3.2">
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">B</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p9.m3.1">h</XMTok>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Clearly <Math mode="inline" tex="h=e^{2\rho}ds^{2}" text="h = e ^ (2 * rho) * d * s ^ 2" xml:id="S4.p9.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> for <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho=\ln\tfrac{2}{1-|x|^{2}}" text="rho = natural-logarithm@(2 / (1 - (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2))" xml:id="S4.p9.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>

                  <XMApp>

                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.p9.m5.1"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p9.m5.1">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and</p>

              <MathBranch>
                <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\nabla\rho" text="nabla@(rho)" xml:id="S4.Ex109.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok name="nabla" role="OPERATOR">∇</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
                <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle=\tfrac{2}{1-|x|^{2}}x;\quad|\nabla\rho|^{2}=\tfrac{4|x|^{2}}{(1-%&#10;|x|^{2})^{2}};" text="formulae@(absent = (2 / (1 - (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2)) * x, (absolute-value@(nabla@(rho))) ^ 2 = (4 * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) / (1 - (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 2)" xml:id="S4.Ex109.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex109.m2.5"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex109.m2.5">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex109.m2.5.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex109.m2.5.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex109.m2.5.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                                        <XMDual>
                                          <XMApp>
                                            <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex109.m2.1"/>
                                          </XMApp>
                                          <XMWrap>

                                                    </XMWrap>
                                                  </XMDual>
                                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                                </XMApp>
                                              </XMApp>
                                              <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>
                                        </XMApp>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

          </equation>

        <p>So Equation (<ref labelref="LABEL:eqf"/>) becomes</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex112">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\tfrac{8x}{(1-|x|^{2})^{3}}(4-n)(1+|x|^{2})=0" text="((8 * x) / (1 - (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 3) * (4 - n) * (1 + (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) = 0" xml:id="S4.Ex112.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>

                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>

                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>

                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex112.m1.2"/>

                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex112.m1.2">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>

                                <XMApp>

                                </XMApp>

                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex112.m1.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex112.m1.4">
                        <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex112.m1.5"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>

                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>

          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S4.p9.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is biharmonic only in dimension four.<break/>However, in dimension four, the Laplacian of its conformal factor <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda^{2}=\tfrac{4}{(1-|x|^{2})^{2}}" text="lambda ^ 2 = 4 / (1 - (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 2" xml:id="S4.p9.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p9.m7.2"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.p9.m7.2">
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.p9.m7.1"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p9.m7.1">x</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex113">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\Delta\lambda^{2}=\tfrac{16}{(1-|x|^{2})^{4}}(4+2|x|^{2})" text="Delta * lambda ^ 2 = (16 / (1 - (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 4) * (4 + 2 * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2)" xml:id="S4.Ex113.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok name="Delta" role="UNKNOWN">Δ</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="16" role="NUMBER">16</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex113.m1.2"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex113.m1.2">
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                              <XMDual>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex113.m1.1"/>
                                </XMApp>
                                <XMWrap>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex113.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                </XMWrap>
                              </XMDual>
                              <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex113.m1.4"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex113.m1.4">
                        <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                          <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex113.m1.3"/>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex113.m1.3">x</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                            <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex114">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\tau(\phi)=-2\operatorname{grad}\rho=\tfrac{-4}{1-|x|^{2}}x\,\mbox{ and }\quad%&#10;|\tau(\phi)|^{2}=\tfrac{64|x|^{2}}{(1-|x|^{2})^{4}}." text="formulae@(tau * phi = - 2 * grad@(rho) = ((- 4) / (1 - (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2)) * x * [ and ], (absolute-value@(tau * phi)) ^ 2 = (64 * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) / (1 - (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 4)" xml:id="S4.Ex114.m1">

        <p>On the other hand:</p>

                                      </XMWrap>
                                    </XMDual>

                </XMWrap>

            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>Therefore</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex116">
          <Math mode="display" tex="4\Delta\lambda^{2}+2\operatorname{div}\langle d\phi,\tau(\phi)\rangle=\tfrac{3%&#10;2}{(1-|x|^{2})^{4}}(4+2|x|^{2})\neq|\tau(\phi)|^{2}," text="4 * Delta * lambda ^ 2 + 2 * div@(d * phi, tau * phi) = (32 / (1 - (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 4) * (4 + 2 * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) not-equals (absolute-value@(tau * phi)) ^ 2" xml:id="S4.Ex116.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex116.m1.7"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex116.m1.7">
                    <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Delta" role="UNKNOWN">Δ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex116.m1.4"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex116.m1.7.1"/>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex116.m1.7.2"/>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.Ex116.m1.4">div</XMTok>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex116.m1.7.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex116.m1.7.2">
                                <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMRef idref="S4.Ex116.m1.3"/>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex116.m1.3">ϕ</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="32" role="NUMBER">32</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex116.m1.2"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex116.m1.2">
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                  <XMDual>
                                    <XMApp>
                                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex116.m1.1"/>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMWrap>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex116.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                    </XMWrap>
                                  </XMDual>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex116.m1.7.3"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex116.m1.7.3">
                            <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                            <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                              <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              <XMApp>
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                                <XMDual>
                                  <XMApp>
                                    <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex116.m1.5"/>
                                  </XMApp>
                                  <XMWrap>
                                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex116.m1.5">x</XMTok>
                                    <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                  </XMWrap>
                                </XMDual>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMApp>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex116.m1.7.4"/>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex116.m1.7.4">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex116.m1.6"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex116.m1.6">ϕ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>so <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S4.p9.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is not a
biharmonic morphism.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>

        <p>and Equation (<ref labelref="LABEL:eqf"/>) becomes</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex119">
          <Math mode="display" tex="\tfrac{2}{(x^{n})^{3}}(n-4)\tfrac{\partial}{\partial x^{n}}=0." text="(2 / x ^ n ^ 3) * (n - 4) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x ^ n)) = 0" xml:id="S4.Ex119.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex119.m1.2"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex119.m1.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="S4.Ex119.m1.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex119.m1.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="3" role="NUMBER">3</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex119.m1.2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex119.m1.2.1">
                            <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>

                            <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PERIOD">.</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>On the other hand, in dimension four, its dilation is <Math mode="inline" tex="\lambda^{2}=\tfrac{1}{(x^{4})^{2}}" text="lambda ^ 2 = 1 / x ^ 4 ^ 2" xml:id="S4.p10.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m6.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.p10.m6.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\tau(\phi)=-2\operatorname{grad}\rho=\tfrac{2}{x^{4}}\tfrac{\partial}{\partial&#10;x%&#10;^{4}}" text="tau * phi = - 2 * grad@(rho) = (2 / x ^ 4) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x ^ 4))" xml:id="S4.p10.m7">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.p10.m7.1"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.p10.m7.1">ϕ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>

                      <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">grad</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>

                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, so</p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx40">
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex120">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle|\tau(\phi)|^{2}=\tfrac{4}{(x^{4})^{4}};\quad\Delta\lambda^{2}=%&#10;\tfrac{6}{(x^{4})^{4}};" text="formulae@((absolute-value@(tau * phi)) ^ 2 = 4 / x ^ 4 ^ 4, Delta * lambda ^ 2 = 6 / x ^ 4 ^ 4)" xml:id="S4.Ex120.m3">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>

                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex120.m3.4.2">
                            <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                            <XMApp>

        </equationgroup>
        <p>so</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex122">
          <Math mode="display" tex="4\Delta\lambda^{2}+2\operatorname{div}\langle d\phi,\tau(\phi)\rangle=\tfrac{1%&#10;2}{(x^{4})^{4}}\neq|\tau(\phi)|^{2}" text="4 * Delta * lambda ^ 2 + 2 * div@(d * phi, tau * phi) = 12 / x ^ 4 ^ 4 not-equals (absolute-value@(tau * phi)) ^ 2" xml:id="S4.Ex122.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Delta" role="UNKNOWN">Δ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex122.m1.3"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex122.m1.5"/>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex122.m1.6"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="S4.Ex122.m1.3">div</XMTok>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex122.m1.5">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex122.m1.6">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex122.m1.2"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex122.m1.2">ϕ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="12" role="NUMBER">12</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex122.m1.1"/>
                      <XMWrap>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                        <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex122.m1.1">
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                      </XMWrap>
                    </XMDual>
                    <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                      <XMRef idref="S4.Ex122.m1.7"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex122.m1.7">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="S4.Ex122.m1.4"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex122.m1.4">ϕ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
        </equation>
        <p>and <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="S4.p10.m8">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is not a biharmonic morphism.
∎</p>
      </para>
    </proof>
    <para xml:id="S4.p11">
      <p>Not all conformal maps in dimension four are biharmonic.</p>
    </para>
    <theorem class="ltx_theorem_ex" inlist="thm theorem:ex" xml:id="Thmex1">
      <tags>
        <tag>Example 1</tag>
        <tag role="refnum">1</tag>
        <tag role="typerefnum">Example 1</tag>
      </tags>
      <title class="ltx_runin"><tag><text font="bold">Example 1</text></tag>.</title>
      <para xml:id="Thmex1.p1">
        <p>1) Consider the identity map <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> from <Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbb{H}}}^{4},g)=({{\mathbb{R}}}_{+}^{4},\tfrac{1}{(x^{4})^{2}}ds^{2})" text="open-interval@(H ^ 4, g) = open-interval@((R _ +) ^ 4, (1 / x ^ 4 ^ 2) * d * s ^ 2)" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m2">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m2.3"/>
                    <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m2.2"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m2.3">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">H</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m2.2">g</XMTok>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
                <XMDual>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                    <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m2.4"/>
                    <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m2.5"/>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMWrap>
                    <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m2.4">
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                    <XMApp xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m2.5">
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                          <XMDual>
                            <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m2.1"/>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                              <XMApp xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m2.1">
                                <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                                <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                                <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                        <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                  </XMWrap>
                </XMDual>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> to <Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbb{R}}}^{4}_{+},ds^{2})" text="open-interval@((R ^ 4) _ +, d * s ^ 2)" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m3">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="open-interval"/>
                  <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m3.1"/>
                  <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m3.2"/>
                </XMApp>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m3.1">
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="blackboard" role="UNKNOWN">R</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                  <XMApp xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m3.2">
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
              </XMDual>
            </XMath>
          </Math>. Then <Math mode="inline" tex="ds^{2}=e^{2\rho}g" text="d * s ^ 2 = e ^ (2 * rho) * g" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m4">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">s</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                      <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>
for <Math mode="inline" tex="\rho=\ln x^{4}" text="rho = natural-logarithm@(x ^ 4)" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m5">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="natural-logarithm" role="OPFUNCTION">ln</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and, using the orthonormal basis <Math mode="inline" tex="\{e_{i}=x^{4}\tfrac{\partial}{\partial x^{i}}\}_{i=1,\dots,4}" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m6">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">{</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                    <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                    <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="partial-differential" name="partial" role="OPERATOR">∂</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post4"/>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">x</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="50%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">}</XMTok>
                </XMWrap>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                  <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">i</XMTok>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="list"/>
                      <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m6.1"/>
                      <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m6.2"/>
                      <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m6.3"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m6.1">1</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" name="dots" role="ID" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m6.2">…</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m6.3">4</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, we have</p>
        <equationgroup class="ltx_eqn_align" xml:id="A0.EGx41">
          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex123">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle\operatorname{grad}^{g}\rho=e_{4};\quad|\operatorname{grad}^{g}%&#10;\rho|_{g}^{2}=1;\quad\operatorname{grad}^{g}|\operatorname{grad}^{g}\rho|^{2}=0;" text="formulae@((grad ^ g)@(rho) = e _ 4, formulae@(((absolute-value@((grad ^ g)@(rho))) _ g) ^ 2 = 1, (grad ^ g)@((absolute-value@((grad ^ g)@(rho))) ^ 2) = 0))" xml:id="S4.Ex123.m3">

              <MathBranch>
                <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\operatorname{grad}^{g}\rho" text="(grad ^ g)@(rho)" xml:id="S4.Ex123.m1">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                          <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">grad</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                        </XMApp>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="rho" role="UNKNOWN">ρ</XMTok>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
                <td align="left"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle=e_{4};\quad|\operatorname{grad}^{g}\rho|_{g}^{2}=1;\quad%&#10;\operatorname{grad}^{g}|\operatorname{grad}^{g}\rho|^{2}=0;" text="formulae@(absent = e _ 4, formulae@(((absolute-value@((grad ^ g)@(rho))) _ g) ^ 2 = 1, (grad ^ g)@((absolute-value@((grad ^ g)@(rho))) ^ 2) = 0))" xml:id="S4.Ex123.m2">
                    <XMath>
                      <XMDual>
                        <XMRef idref="S4.Ex123.m2.1"/>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex123.m2.1">
                            <XMApp>
                              <XMTok meaning="formulae"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex123.m2.1.1"/>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex123.m2.1.2"/>
                            </XMApp>
                            <XMWrap>
                              <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex123.m2.1.1">
                                <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                                <XMTok meaning="absent"/>
                                <XMApp>
                                  <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                                  <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                              <XMTok role="PUNCT" rpadding="10.0pt">;</XMTok>
                              <XMDual xml:id="S4.Ex123.m2.1.2">
                                <XMApp>

        <p>Testing Equation (<ref labelref="LABEL:eqf"/>), we have <Math mode="inline" tex="-2e_{4}\neq 0" text="- 2 * e _ 4 not-equals 0" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m9">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">e</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="0" role="NUMBER">0</XMTok>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math>, so <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m10">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> is not biharmonic.<break/>Moreover, from simple considerations

        <p>so <Math mode="inline" tex="4\Delta\lambda^{2}+2\operatorname{div}\langle d\phi,\tau(\phi)\rangle\neq|\tau%&#10;(\phi)|^{2}" text="4 * Delta * lambda ^ 2 + 2 * div@(d * phi, tau * phi) not-equals (absolute-value@(tau * phi)) ^ 2" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m11">
            <XMath>
              <XMApp>
                <XMTok meaning="not-equals" name="neq" role="RELOP">≠</XMTok>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="4" role="NUMBER">4</XMTok>
                    <XMTok name="Delta" role="UNKNOWN">Δ</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                      <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    </XMApp>
                  </XMApp>
                  <XMApp>
                    <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                    <XMTok meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                    <XMDual>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m11.2"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m11.4"/>
                        <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m11.5"/>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m11.2">div</XMTok>
                        <XMWrap>
                          <XMTok name="langle" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">⟨</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m11.4">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" role="UNKNOWN">d</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                          <XMApp xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m11.5">
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m11.1"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m11.1">ϕ</XMTok>
                                <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                              </XMWrap>
                            </XMDual>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMTok name="rangle" role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">⟩</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMDual>
                  </XMApp>
                </XMApp>
                <XMApp>
                  <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                      <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m11.6"/>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                      <XMApp xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m11.6">
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok font="italic" name="tau" role="UNKNOWN">τ</XMTok>
                        <XMDual>
                          <XMRef idref="Thmex1.p1.m11.3"/>
                          <XMWrap>
                            <XMTok role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m11.3">ϕ</XMTok>
                            <XMTok role="CLOSE" stretchy="false">)</XMTok>
                          </XMWrap>
                        </XMDual>
                      </XMApp>
                      <XMTok role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                    </XMWrap>
                  </XMDual>
                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                </XMApp>
              </XMApp>
            </XMath>
          </Math> and <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="Thmex1.p1.m12">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> does not satisfy (<ref labelref="LABEL:eqd"/>).<break/></p>
      </para>
      <para xml:id="Thmex1.p2">
        <p>2) Let <Math mode="inline" tex="\phi" text="phi" xml:id="Thmex1.p2.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMTok font="italic" name="phi" role="UNKNOWN">ϕ</XMTok>
            </XMath>
          </Math> be the identity map from <Math mode="inline" tex="({{\mathbb{R}}}^{n},g=\tfrac{4}{(1+\epsilon|x|^{2})^{2}}ds^{2})" text="list@(R ^ n, g) = (4 / (1 + epsilon * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 2) * d * s ^ 2" xml:id="Thmex1.p2.m2">

<Math mode="inline" tex="e_{i}=\tfrac{1+\epsilon|x|^{2}}{2}\tfrac{\partial}{\partial x^{i}}" text="e _ i = ((1 + epsilon * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) / 2) * (partial-differential / partial-differential@(x ^ i))" xml:id="Thmex1.p2.m8">

                        <XMTok font="italic" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>

                </XMath>
              </Math>
              <MathBranch>
                <td align="right"><Math mode="inline" tex="\displaystyle\nabla^{g}_{e_{i}}e_{j}" text="((nabla ^ g) _ e _ i)@(e _ j)" xml:id="S4.Ex129.m1">

        <p>where <Math mode="inline" tex="X=\sum_{k=1}^{n}x^{k}e_{k}" text="X = ((sum _ (k = 1)) ^ n)@(x ^ k * e _ k)" xml:id="Thmex1.p2.m10">

          </Math>.

          <equation xml:id="S4.Ex131">
            <MathFork>
              <Math tex="\displaystyle|\operatorname{grad}^{g}\ln\lambda|_{g}^{2}=\tfrac{4}{(1+\epsilon%&#10;|x|^{2})^{2}}\tfrac{(1+\epsilon|x|^{2})^{2}}{4}|x|^{2}=|x|^{2};" text="((absolute-value@((grad ^ g)@(natural-logarithm@(lambda)))) _ g) ^ 2 = (4 / (1 + epsilon * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 2) * ((1 + epsilon * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) ^ 2 / 4) * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2 = (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2" xml:id="S4.Ex131.m2">
                <XMath>
                  <XMDual>
                    <XMRef idref="S4.Ex131.m2.7"/>
                    <XMWrap>
                      <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex131.m2.7">
                        <XMTok meaning="multirelation"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUBSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post9"/>

                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                                      <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="1" role="NUMBER">1</XMTok>
                                      <XMApp>
                                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                                        <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" name="epsilon" role="UNKNOWN">ϵ</XMTok>
                                        <XMApp>
                                          <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post10"/>
                                          <XMDual>
                                            <XMApp>
                                              <XMTok meaning="absolute-value"/>
                                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex134.m1.1"/>
                                            </XMApp>
                                            <XMWrap>
                                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN" xml:id="S4.Ex134.m1.1">x</XMTok>
                                              <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="VERTBAR" stretchy="false">|</XMTok>
                                            </XMWrap>
                                          </XMDual>
                                          <XMTok fontsize="50%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                        </XMApp>
                                      </XMApp>
                                    </XMApp>
                                    <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="2" role="NUMBER">2</XMTok>
                                  </XMApp>
                                </XMApp>
                              </XMApp>
                            </XMWrap>
                          </XMDual>
                          <XMTok role="PUNCT">,</XMTok>
                        </XMWrap>
                      </XMDual>
                    </XMath>
                  </Math></td>
              </MathBranch>
            </MathFork>
          </equation>
        </equationgroup>
        <p>we have <Math mode="inline" tex="\Delta^{g}\ln\lambda=\epsilon\tfrac{n+(2-n)\epsilon|x|^{2}}{2}" text="Delta ^ g * natural-logarithm@(lambda) = epsilon * ((n + (2 - n) * epsilon * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) / 2)" xml:id="Thmex1.p2.m12">

        <p>so</p>
        <equation xml:id="S4.Ex140">
          <Math mode="display" tex="-\Delta\operatorname{grad}^{g}\ln\lambda=\tfrac{n+(2-n)\epsilon|x|^{2}}{2}X." text="- Delta * (grad ^ g)@(natural-logarithm@(lambda)) = ((n + (2 - n) * epsilon * (absolute-value@(x)) ^ 2) / 2) * X" xml:id="S4.Ex140.m1">
            <XMath>
              <XMDual>
                <XMRef idref="S4.Ex140.m1.3"/>
                <XMWrap>
                  <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex140.m1.3">
                    <XMTok meaning="equals" role="RELOP">=</XMTok>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                        <XMTok name="Delta" role="UNKNOWN">Δ</XMTok>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok role="SUPERSCRIPTOP" scriptpos="post3"/>
                            <XMTok role="OPFUNCTION" scriptpos="post">grad</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">g</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="natural-logarithm" role="OPFUNCTION">ln</XMTok>
                            <XMTok font="italic" name="lambda" role="UNKNOWN">λ</XMTok>
                          </XMApp>
                        </XMApp>
                      </XMApp>
                    </XMApp>
                    <XMApp>
                      <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                      <XMApp>
                        <XMTok mathstyle="text" meaning="divide" role="FRACOP"/>
                        <XMApp>
                          <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="plus" role="ADDOP">+</XMTok>
                          <XMTok font="italic" fontsize="70%" role="UNKNOWN">n</XMTok>
                          <XMApp>
                            <XMTok meaning="times" role="MULOP">⁢</XMTok>
                            <XMDual>
                              <XMRef idref="S4.Ex140.m1.2"/>
                              <XMWrap>
                                <XMTok fontsize="70%" role="OPEN" stretchy="false">(</XMTok>
                                <XMApp xml:id="S4.Ex140.m1.2">
                                  <XMTok fontsize="70%" meaning="minus" role="ADDOP">-</XMTok>
